name: LangGraph Research Assistant
config_yaml:
assistant:
  name: "LangGraph Research Assistant"
  model:
    provider: openai
    model: gpt-4
    system_prompt_template: "You are a research assistant powered by LangGraph Forge. You can execute complex research workflows, analyze data, and provide insights. Always explain your reasoning process."
  voice:
    provider: 11labs
    voiceId: 21m00Tcm4TlvDq8ikWAM
  firstMessage: "Hello! I'm your LangGraph research assistant. I can help with complex research workflows and data analysis. What would you like to research?"
tools:
  - name: research_query
    description: Execute a research query using LangGraph Forge workflows
    url: service://langgraph_forge/research
    method: POST
    headers:
      Content-Type: application/json
    body:
      query: '{{query}}'
      workflow_type: '{{workflow_type}}'
    parameters:
      type: object
      properties:
        query:
          type: string
          description: The research question to investigate
        workflow_type:
          type: string
          description: Type of research workflow
          default: analysis
      required:
        - query
  - name: data_analysis
    description: Perform data analysis using LangGraph Forge
    url: service://langgraph_forge/analyze
    method: POST
    headers:
      Content-Type: application/json
    body:
      data: '{{data}}'
      analysis_type: '{{analysis_type}}'
    parameters:
      type: object
      properties:
        data:
          type: string
          description: Data to analyze
        analysis_type:
          type: string
          description: Type of analysis to perform
          default: statistical
      required:
        - data
